<parameter name="id" isForPrompting="true" class="java.lang.String"> <defaultValueExpression ><![CDATA["2c9081ba0e099848010e09991168001a"]]></defaultValueExpression> </parameter> <parameter name="type" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"> <defaultValueExpression ><![CDATA["businessRole"]]></defaultValueExpression> </parameter> <queryString><![CDATA[select b.name as bundleName from spt_identity_bundles ib left outer join spt_bundle b on ib.bundle = b.id where ib.identity_id = $P{id} order by bundleName]]></queryString>
